data:item.name: MCX Accel and Pressure Monitor
data:item.display_title: Multi sensor demo with FRDM-MCXN947 and LDC-PAR-S035
data:item.overview: This demo shows how to integrate the NXP sensors FXLS8974CF (3-axis accelerometer) and MPL3115 (absolute pressure) with FRDM-MCXN947 platform. Both sensors share the I2C bus of the Accel & Pressure click board, that is used in the demo for digital communication between the MCXN947 and the sensors.Â The demo uses the LVGL graphics framework and a TFT Display (LCD-PAR-S035) to show sensor data
